demo1.tabTip: This is just a tool tip in the Demo 1 tab.
demo1.title: Demo 1

pathfield.fieldDescription: The PathField is an input field designed for paths with path completion and a button to open a CQ.BrowseDialog for browsing the server repository. It can also browse page paragraphs for advanced link generation.
pathfield.maxLengthText: The selected path is way too long, sorry!
pathfield.minLengthText: The selected path is way too short, sorry!
pathfield.name: ./pathfield
pathfield.regexText: That path requires at least 1 number in it.

clearcombo.fieldDescription:
The ClearableComboBox is a non-editable combo box with a trigger to clear its value.
The array property "store" displays values too. But, the value saved is the same as the one displayed in the dropdown.
clearcombo.name: ./clearcombo
clearcombo.title: Please select...

colorfield.fieldDescription: The ColorField lets the user enter a color hex value either directly or using a CQ.Ext.menu.ColorMenu.
colorfield.name: ./colorfield

datefield.fieldDescription: Provides a date input field with a CQ.Ext.DatePicker dropdown and automatic date validation
datefield.name: ./datefield

datetime.fieldDescription: The DateTime lets the user enter a date and a time by combining CQ.Ext.form.DateField and CQ.Ext.form.TimeField.
datetime.name: ./datetime

dialogfieldset.fieldDescription: The DialogFieldSet is a FieldSet for use in Dialogs.
dialogfieldset.title: Dialog Field Set

fileuploaddialogbutton.fieldDescription: The FileUploadDialogButton creates a button that opens a new dialog for uploading a file via the FileUploadField. Can be used inside edit dialogs where the upload must happen in a separate form in the new dialog.
fileuploaddialogbutton.name: ./fileuploaddialogbutton
fileuploaddialogbutton.text: Click here to upload a file

htmleditor.fieldDescription: Provides a lightweight HTML Editor component. Some toolbar features are not supported by Safari and will be automatically hidden when needed. These are noted in the config options where appropriate.
htmleditor.fontFamilies: [Arial,Courier New,Tahoma,Times New Roman,Verdana,Comic Sans MS,Impact,Lucida Console]
htmleditor.name: ./htmleditor

inlinetextfield.fieldDescription: The InlineField is a text field which is displayed as a label when not in focus.
inlinetextfield.name: ./inlinetextfield

label.text: This is the purpose of using the "label" widget. We can hide the label to add it as a description. Unfortunately, you cannot add HTML tags

multifield.fieldDescription: The MultiField is an editable list of form fields for editing multi-value properties.
multifield.name: ./multifield
multifield.title: Add elements here

numberfield.fieldDescription: Numeric text field that provides automatic keystroke filtering and numeric validation.
numberfield.maxText: Amounts higher than 950.000 are not allowed
numberfield.minText: Values lower than -10 are not allowed
numberfield.name: ./numberfield

ownerdraw.fieldDescription: The OwnerDraw can contain custom HTML code (either entered directly or retrieved from a URL).

This is a heading in a div element

This is some text in a div element.


Header 1 Header 2 Header 3

  2. Second feature.
  3. Third feature.
  1. First feature.
  2. Second feature.
  3. Third feature.
  1. First feature.
  2. Second feature.
  3. Third feature.
ownerdraw.name: ./ownerdraw
ownerdraw.title: HTML code is rendered here:

paragraphreference.blankText: A paragraph must be selected, sorry bro!
paragraphreference.fieldDescription: The paragraph refrence field allows to browse pages and select one of their paragraphs. It consists of a trigger field and a associated paragraph browse dialog.
paragraphreference.maxLengthText: The selected paragraph is way too long!
paragraphreference.name: ./paragraphreference
paragraphreference.regexText: That path requires at least 1 number in it.

password.fieldDescription: The Password is like a CQ.Ext.form.TextField but keeps its value private, allowing users to enter sensitive data.
password.name: ./password

progress.fieldDescription:
An updateable progress bar component. The progress bar supports two different modes: manual and automatic.
In manual mode, you are responsible for showing, updating (via updateProgress) and clearing the progress bar as needed from your own code. This method is most appropriate when you want to show progress throughout an operation that has predictable points of interest at which you can update the control.
In automatic mode, you simply call wait and let the progress bar run indefinitely, only clearing it once the operation is complete. You can optionally have the progress bar wait for a specific amount of time and then clear itself. Automatic mode is most appropriate for timed operations or asynchronous operations in which you have no need for indicating intermediate progress.

richtext.fieldDescription: The RichText provides a form field for editing styled text information (rich text).
richtext.name: ./richtext

selectioncheck.blankText: Oops! You must select an option
selectioncheck.fieldDescription: The Selection lets the user choose between several options. The options can be part of the configuration or loaded from a JSON repsone. The Selection can either be rendered as dropdown (select), combobox (select plus free text entry), checkboxes or radio buttons.
selectioncheck.name: ./selection-check
selectioncheck.title: Please select...

selectionradio.blankText: Oops! You must select an option
selectionradio.fieldDescription: The Selection lets the user choose between several options. The options can be part of the configuration or loaded from a JSON repsone. The Selection can either be rendered as dropdown (select), combobox (select plus free text entry), checkboxes or radio buttons.
selectionradio.name: ./selection-radio
selectionradio.title: Please select...

selectionselect.blankText: Oops! You must select an option
selectionselect.fieldDescription: The Selection lets the user choose between several options. The options can be part of the configuration or loaded from a JSON repsone. The Selection can either be rendered as dropdown (select), combobox (select plus free text entry), checkboxes or radio buttons.
selectionselect.name: ./selection-select
selectionselect.title: Please select...

box.fieldDescription: This is just a spacer widget used to add some distance between widgets.

selectioncombo.blankText: Oops! You must select an option
selectioncombo.fieldDescription: The Selection lets the user choose between several options. The options can be part of the configuration or loaded from a JSON repsone. The Selection can either be rendered as dropdown (select), combobox (select plus free text entry), checkboxes or radio buttons.

sizefield.fieldDescription: The SizeField lets the user enter the width and height (for example for an image).
sizefield.title: Please select...

html5smartfile.fieldDescription:
The SmartFile is an intelligent file uploader.
If the browser supports HTML5, uploads are executed using the HTML5 that provides a convenient way to handle uploads. If the browser does not support such way of upload or if it is disabled by the corresponding config option, a HTML fallback is used instead, which imposes some restrictions compared with the HTML5 version.
Component linking may be used to validate form fields that depend on the content of a SmartFile instance. Just add the name of the dependant SmartFile instance as a linkedComponent property (type: String) to the corresponding field(s). The SmartFile component will then call the CQ.Ext.form.TextField.validate method of the linked form field to trigger the validation. There is also a SmartFile-specific VType available: use "requiredOnLinkedData" for fields that are required only if the linked SmartFile component has a file uploaded or referenced.
html5smartfile.mimeTypesDescription: Only JPGs, GIFs and PNGs are allowed.
html5smartfile.name: ./html5smartfile
html5smartfile.title: Smart File
html5smartfile.uploadText: Drop an asset or click to upload

demo2.tabTip: This is just a tool tip in the Demo 2 tab.
demo2.title: Demo 2

spinner.fieldDescription:
The Spinner is a trigger field for numeric, date or time values. The value can be increased and decreased by using the provided up and down triggers, the scroll wheel or keys.
The behavior of the spinning is defined in a CQ.form.Spinner.Strategy. Each Strategy allows two different speeds of spinning. The normal increment is definied as incrementValue of the Strategy and the alternate increment as alternateIncrementValue.
The Spinner supports multiple possibilities to spin:
* Use the trigger buttons
* Hover the field and use the scroll wheel
* When using triggers or scroll wheel additionally hold the alternate key (shift) for alternate spinning
* Focus the field and use the keys "up" and "down"
* Use the keys "page up" and "page down" for alternate spinning
* Drag the splitter between the up and down trigger
spinner.name: ./spinner
spinner.regexText: Only positive numbers are allowed, sorry!

strategy.dummy-info: Check the /libs/cq/ui/widgets/source/ext/source/util/Date.js class to see the possible values for the alternateIncrementConstant values.

This is a paragraph.

tableedit2.fieldDescription: The TableEdit2 provides a widget for creating tables.
tableedit2.name: ./tableedit2

tags.fieldDescription: A form widget for displaying and entering CQ Tags. It has a popup menu for selecting from existing tags, includes auto-completion, allows to create tags on the fly, supports tag namespaces, tag title localization and bulk-editing.
tags.name: ./tags
tags.title: Select a random tag!

textarea.fieldDescription: Multiline text field. Can be used as a direct replacement for traditional textarea fields, plus adds support for auto-sizing.
textarea.name: ./textarea

textbutton.fieldDescription: The TextButton provides a text link with the capabilities of a CQ.Ext.Button.
textbutton.handler: function(button, e) { alert('Alert! The button was clicked'); }
textbutton.text: Click here to display an alert...
textbutton.toggleHandler: function(button, e) { alert('Alert! The button toggled: ' + button.pressed); }

textfield.fieldDescription: Basic text field. Can be used as a direct replacement for traditional text inputs, or as the base class for more sophisticated input controls (like CQ.Ext.form.TextArea and CQ.Ext.form.ComboBox).
textfield.name: ./textfield

firstimage.fieldDescription:
The SmartImage is an intelligent image uploader. It provides tools to process an uploaded image, for example a tool to define image maps and an image cropper.
Note that the component is mainly designed for use on a separate dialog tab. You may use the component inside a CQ.Ext.layout.FormLayout optionally if you provide a suitable height setting.
firstimage.name: ./firstimage/file
firstimage.uploadText: Drop an image or click to upload

secondimage.name: ./secondimage/file
secondimage.title: Drop an image from the Content Finder...
secondimage.uploadText: Drop an image or click to upload

imagetab.mimeTypesDescription: Only PNG and JPEG files are allowed.
imagetab.name: ./tabimage/file
imagetab.title: Image Tab
imagetab.uploadText: Drop an image or click to upload
